Static Private Attributes

static LogHandler handler = null

Detailed Description

The class manages logging for the collector. It uses a LogHandler for the actual logging.

Member Function Documentation

static void org::ipdr::api::log::LogManager::stackTrace (  String  msg  )  [inline, static]
 

For debugging when we don't have an interactive debugger; this can be called anywhere to give information about where we are.

Parameters:
msg Message to output with the stack trace. 
00249     {
00250         Exception e = new Exception(msg);
00251         System.err.println("Forcing stack trace: " + msg);
00252         stackTrace(e);
00253     }
